Body:
des_p_test = DESP()
des_p_test.n_classes_ = 3
expected = np.array([[True, False, True], [True, False, True], [False, True,
    False]])
competences = np.array([[0.34, 0.32, 1.0], [0.5, 0.3, 1.01], [0.25, 1.0, 0.25]]
    )
selected = des_p_test.select(competences)
assert np.array_equal(selected, expected)
